description: Corn tortillas filled with spiced black beans and cheese, baked under smoky enchilada sauce and plated with cilantro-lime rice.

imagePrompt.base: Vibrant close-up of Black Bean Enchiladas, plated to showcase vivid textures and color. Incorporate visual cues from this description: Corn tortillas filled with spiced black beans and cheese, baked under smoky enchilada sauce and plated with cilantro-lime rice.. Scene: mexican-inspired table with soft natural daylight, eye-level perspective, and shallow depth of field. Capture fresh garnish, gentle steam, and a sense of homemade comfort. No people or branded props.
imagePrompt.enhanced: Irresistible close-up: perfectly baked enchiladas, generously coated in a rich, smoky sauce, with bubbling cheese and spiced black bean filling peeking. Nestled beside fluffy cilantro-lime rice, adorned with vibrant fresh cilantro and a glistening lime wedge. Bathed in soft, warm natural daylight, captured from a slightly elevated eye-level perspective with shallow depth of field. Gentle steam rises, evoking ultimate homemade comfort on a rustic, Mexican-inspired surface.
